channel.title: 'Global Objects'
channel.description:
Does anyone know where and how to add globalobjects to Hyperion. I know the code is somewhere along the lines of
[code] public GameObject(GameObjectDefinition definition, Location location, int type, int rotation) {[/code]
but I'm not sure what quite to replace some of the things with plus I'm not sure if it's supposed to go into GameObject.java
